description:
Burly aluminum flats for your burly mountain bike. CNC machined from a block of 6000 series aluminum, the Lots pedals aren’t afraid to drop into even the gnarliest rock gardens.

  • 6061 aluminum keeps weight and strength high
  • Slight concavity helps keep your feet from moving
  • Sealed cartridge and bearing for an easy spin
  • 107 x 98mm offers efficient power transfer
  • 10 replaceable pins per side
name: MEC LOTS Pedals
